versionInformation.versionDescription:
Refactoring .. a lot of refactoring.
1. I tried to rationalize the Channel List classes 2. I broke up three of the largest sub-packages: a. util becomes 3 new packages b. channel - several classes moved to one of the util packages c. move all instances of messages into xml.messages
Eclipse should have done all the re-wiring; running the ChannelSelector works fine.
